sentence.Network_en: As Joe got out his breviary for evening prayer, he heard footsteps at his doorway.
sentence.Network_cn: 就如乔对于晚上祈祷离开他的每日祈祷书的, 他在他的门口听到脚步.

sentence.Network_en: The celebrated breviary remained in the family, and was in the count's possession.
sentence.Network_cn: 那本著名的祈祷书仍由这个家族的人保存着, 现在已归伯爵所有.

PerfectNetExp.abs: brevet 名誉晋升breviary 每日祈祷书brevier 八点活字
...喻在人类对计算机科学的认知、理解和推理中起着重要的作用,并反过来激发、促进了计算机隐喻性词汇的生成。2. 缩略(breviary)在计算机科学与技术突飞猛进的今天,人们对那些频繁使用的概念或术语倾向于用缩略式来代替,以隐喻更多的信.
canonical prayers recited daily by priests ( e.g. the breviary of the Roman Catholic Church ) .每天被牧师背诵的规范祈祷（如罗马天主教的祈祷书)。
说到改革宗教会传统中的早祷和晚祷, 这两项灵命操练的传统其实是源自天主教日课经(breviary)- 包含祈祷、 敬拜和诗歌的仪式书- 中的祷告仪式。初代教会一直到.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (also denoting an abridged version of the Psalms): from Latin breviarium 'summary, abridgement', from breviare 'abridge', from brevis 'short, brief'

means.word_mean: 1. (Roman Catholic Church) a book of prayers to be recited daily certain priests and members of religious orders

auth_sentence.content: The daily recitation of the breviary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The daily recitation of the breviary.
